name: The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker
description: YOU are a psychiatrist, trying to solve a murder whilst treating the unusual patients of the recently deceased Doctor Dekker. Type a question - patients reply in full screen video and have questions for you too but be careful what you say. Your words determine their eventual fates, and your own!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Pentium 4 SSE2 onwards (dual core) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD3000 or comparable Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Additional Notes: Must be capable of playing full HD videos
